name: Lost Planets
description:
"Lost Planets" is a top-down shooter made for BlackthornProd GameJam 2 in 4 days. I hope you'll enjoy it :)

Note: The Mac and Windows versions should be fine but I couldn't test the Linux version.

Keyboard and mouse required. Controls:

  • [WASD] to move.
  • [Mouse Left click] to shoot or select a target area (Jupiter AOE).
  • [Mouse Right click] to begin targeting an area (requires Jupiter skill).
  • [E] to heal (requires Earth skill).
  • [SPACE] to launch the local AOE (requires Mars skill).

All assets have been created by me using:

  • Graphics: Procreate on iPad and Affinity Designer on Mac.
  • Sounds/Musics: Garage Band on iPad and Audacity.

No unity asset have been used, only the packages found in package manager (cinemachine, progrid, etc.)
